Static HMAC

  • HMAC(key: Buffer, data: Buffer): Buffer
    • Defined in Cryptography.ts:60

    Creates a Hash Message Authentication Code.

    This method uses SHA512 algorithm and create-hmac dependency for the MAC generation.

    Parameters

    • key: Buffer
    • data: Buffer

    Returns Buffer
